Senior Web Developer

Location: San Francisco, CA Department: Development Type: Full Time Min. Experience: Experienced

Send resumes to: 93962-CS-5429@zillow.hrmdirect.com

Zillow, a vibrant growth-oriented company, recently acquired RentJuice to drive growth on the rental side of the business. In addition to a competitive salary, RentJuice also offers great stock options, benefits and the opportunity to work with a lot of fun, talented people in the heart of San Francisco. RentJuice is looking to add to a small but growing team of web developers enthusiastic about building web applications and modernizing the apartment rental industry.

Requirements:

  • Familiarity with LAMP stack and strong proficiency in PHP, JavaScript and MySQL
  • Strong command of web standards, CSS based-design and browser compatibility
  • Experience writing and optimizing database queries against large datasets
  • Ability to seamlessly switch between back-end and front-end development to polish a feature to completion

Some of the technologies we (and you would) use:

  • PHP, MySQL, Apache, nginx
  • JQuery
  • Elastic Search
  • Amazon Web Services: EC2, S3, CloudFront, AutoScaling
  • Gearman
  • iText
  • Jenkins, Selenium

Bonus skills:

  • Caching technology (Memcached, etc.)
  • Scaling strategies (heavy traffic or intensive tasks)
  • Browser Extension Development (Firefox, Chrome, IE)
  • System administration (Ubuntu)
  • Mobile Development (iPhone / Android / Blackberry)

If interested, email your resume directly to the following address:

93962-CS-5429@zillow.hrmdirect.com
